Violation_Type: Failure to meet physical presence requirement
Legal_Issue: Whether the citizenship judge erred in applying the physical presence test instead of the 'centralization of life' test
Application_Facts: Applicant was present in Canada for 1,081 days within a four-year period, falling short of the 1,095-day requirement
Remedy_Requested: Appeal to Federal Court to overturn the citizenship judge's decision
Defendant_Behavior: Citizenship judge applied the statutory physical presence test
Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged legal and procedural error in applying physical presence test over 'centralization of life' test
Legal_Standard: Physical presence of at least 1,095 days in Canada during the four years preceding application
Assessment_Factor: Number of days physically present in Canada
Procedural_Issue: Appeal on legal and procedural grounds
Evidence_Used: Records of applicant's entry and exit dates, residency documentation
Legal_Provision_Cited: Section of Citizenship Act requiring 1,095 days of physical presence
Evidence_Assessed: Proof of days spent in Canada
Relief_Sought: Grant of citizenship or remittal for reconsideration
Governing_Rule: Physical presence is mandatory unless exceptional circumstances justify use of 'centralization of life' test
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Insufficient proof of meeting 1,095-day physical presence requirement
Harm_Assessment: Denial of citizenship rights and benefits
Cause_Description: Applicant failed to meet statutory physical residency requirement
Evidence_Handling: Residency records reviewed and found insufficient
Evidence_Issues: Lack of sufficient documentation to prove required days of residence
Residency_Compliance: Not met (1,081 days out of 1,095 required)
Evidence_Assessment: Judge assessed evidence and found it did not establish compliance with physical presence test
Decision_Rationale: The Citizenship Act requires physical presence; 'centralization of life' test applies only in exceptional circumstances, which were not demonstrated
Evidentiary_Issues: Applicant未能 provide adequate evidence to prove required residency duration
Legal_Standard_Applied: Statutory physical presence test under the Citizenship Act
